alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 30 at 2:33PM MST until December 02 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...A strong cold front will bring a band of moderate to heavy snow through northern Utah after midnight Friday, ending by 11 AM. This heavy band of snow will last 2-4 hours in most locations. Significant impacts are expected to travel including the Friday morning commute across all of northern Utah. Strong, gusty winds near the front may also cause blowing and drifting of snow. Periods of snow will continue for mountain areas into the afternoon...with lower rates.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
